t: Candy Kittens | Gourmet Vegan Sweets | No Nasties. All Good
s: We became the first B Corp certified sweets brand in October 2022! London, 2012. Big things are going on in the city. That’s right - in their little Chelsea office, Jamie and Ed are cooking up a plan to take the sweets industry by storm. They decided it was time someone stood up and challenged the big beasts in the confectionery world. Over the next 18 months, they developed and refined their idea to create better sweets - gourmet sweets, made for adults. And Candy Kittens ...
